abstract: Entering the new Buddh International Circuit outside New Delhi, scene of the F1 race this weekend, felt like coming into a different country.
snippet: Entering the new Buddh International Circuit outside New Delhi, scene of the F1 race this weekend, felt like coming into a different country.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI - Since Tuesday I have been on a series of airplanes, taxis, metros, commuter trains and have walked through garbage heaps and dark unknown alleys in parts of the world I never dreamed existed. On the final leg of the trip Thursday morning I took a strange, motorized rickshaw from Noida City Center to the Buddh International Circuit outside New Delhi.

headline.main: A Passage to the Buddh Circuit in India
